wallDescription: A simple wall of rough hewn stone

gameObjects.name: hidden items in the wall
gameObjects.description: A brick you could dig out of the wall with the appropriate tools.

gameObjects.name: passage to the next room
gameObjects.description: A creaking, half open wooden door.

gameObjects.name: Tranquil spot
gameObjects.description: A tranquil spot below a broken statue. You feel confident you can lock the doors to this room and rest here.
